content.text: I'm a perfectionist, so I take forever to get tasks done. I start early and clock out late. I think I need a vacation.
Ah, I work at a non profit that helps children, so I can relate to the long hours. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go horseback riding, and I love going to concerts and dancing hard.
That sounds like fun! I love cheese, so I'm always looking for new places to try.
Oh, I love cheese too! I'm allergic to shellfish, so I can't have any, but I love it in everything else.
That's a shame, but you can always have cheese fries.
True, but I prefer it in other foods.
What's your favorite cheese?
I like cheddar, but I also like brie and goat cheese.
I like those too, but my favorite is mozzarella.
Mozzarella is good, but I think it's a bit bland.
I know what you mean, but I like the way it melts.
Me too, it's perfect for pizza.
Exactly! What's your favorite kind of pizza?
I like pepperoni and mushroom, but I also like cheese pizza.
I like those too, but I like to mix it up with some veggies.
Me too, I like artichokes and spinach on my pizza.
That sounds delicious! I'll have to try that next time.
You should! It's really good.
I will.
